title: Demonstrates using pins with pkgdown
text: package contains exactly one thing: shamelessly unoriginal dataset, column added metric consumption. purpose package demonstrate package dataset can published consumed using pins pkgdown.
code: library("pkgpins")  head(mtcars_metric) #>                    mpg cyl disp  hp drat    wt  qsec vs am gear carb lper100km #> Mazda RX4         21.0   6  160 110 3.90 2.620 16.46  0  1    4    4  11.20071 #> Mazda RX4 Wag     21.0   6  160 110 3.90 2.875 17.02  0  1    4    4  11.20071 #> Datsun 710        22.8   4  108  93 3.85 2.320 18.61  1  1    4    1  10.31645 #> Hornet 4 Drive    21.4   6  258 110 3.08 3.215 19.44  1  0    3    1  10.99136 #> Hornet Sportabout 18.7   8  360 175 3.15 3.440 17.02  0  0    3    2  12.57834 #> Valiant           18.1   6  225 105 2.76 3.460 20.22  1  0    3    1  12.99530 # devtools::install_github("rstudio/pins-r") library("pins")   board <- board_url("https://ijlyttle.github.io/pkgpins/pins-board/")  board |> pin_list() #> [1] "mtcars_metric"  board |> pin_versions("mtcars_metric") #> # A tibble: 1 × 3 #>   version                created             hash  #>   <chr>                  <dttm>              <chr> #> 1 20221225T005922Z-8416c 2022-12-24 18:59:22 8416c  board |> pin_read("mtcars_metric") |> head() #>                    mpg cyl disp  hp drat    wt  qsec vs am gear carb lper100km #> Mazda RX4         21.0   6  160 110 3.90 2.620 16.46  0  1    4    4   11.2007 #> Mazda RX4 Wag     21.0   6  160 110 3.90 2.875 17.02  0  1    4    4   11.2007 #> Datsun 710        22.8   4  108  93 3.85 2.320 18.61  1  1    4    1   10.3164 #> Hornet 4 Drive    21.4   6  258 110 3.08 3.215 19.44  1  0    3    1   10.9914 #> Hornet Sportabout 18.7   8  360 175 3.15 3.440 17.02  0  0    3    2   12.5783 #> Valiant           18.1   6  225 105 2.76 3.460 20.22  1  0    3    1   12.9953

what: Motor Trend Car Road Tests, but Metric Consumption — mtcars_metric
title: Motor Trend Car Road Tests, but Metric Consumption — mtcars_metric
text: update classic R dataset: data extracted 1974 Motor Trend US magazine, comprises fuel consumption 10 aspects automobile design performance 32 automobiles (1973–74 models).

title: Motor Trend Car Road Tests, but Metric Consumption — mtcars_metric
Motor Trend Car Road Tests, but Metric Consumption — mtcars_metric
text: data frame 32 observations 12 (numeric) variables. mpg Miles/(US) gallon cyl Number cylinders disp Displacement (cu..) hp Gross horsepower drat Rear axle ratio wt Weight (1000 lbs) qsec 1/4 mile time vs Engine (0 = V-shaped, 1 = straight) Transmission (0 = automatic, 1 = manual) gear Number forward gears carb Number carburetors lper100km Liters/100 km

title: Motor Trend Car Road Tests, but Metric Consumption — mtcars_metric
